text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
God’s plans for me are good, with hope and a future.
God is with me; He strengthens and upholds me.
God works all things together for my good.
The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing.
The Lord is my light and salvation—I will not fear.
God is my refuge and strength, ever-present help.
Be strong and courageous; God is with you.
God will never leave me nor forsake me.
Those who hope in the Lord renew their strength.
Jesus gives rest to the weary and burdened.
Jesus gives me peace, not as the world gives.
Trust in the Lord; He will make my paths straight.
Cast all anxiety on Him, for He cares for me.
God gives wisdom generously to those who ask.
Under His wings I find refuge and protection.
Those who seek the Lord lack no good thing.
Nothing can separate me from God’s love in Christ.
His grace is sufficient; His power perfect in weakness.
God gives me power, love, and a sound mind.
God supplies all my needs in Christ Jesus.
God opens the windows of heaven with blessing.
Seek first His kingdom; all else will be added.
The Lord keeps me from harm and watches over me.
Delight in the Lord, and He will give desires.
Cast burdens on the Lord; He will sustain me.
When I pass through waters and fire, He is with me.
His mercies are new every morning; great is faithfulness.
He will not forsake me; I will not be afraid.
Jesus gives abundant, full life.
God so loved the world; eternal life through the Son.
Confess and believe—salvation is mine.
If I confess, He forgives and cleanses me.
He forgives all sins and heals all diseases.
God is my healer.
By His wounds I am healed and made whole.
By His wounds I am healed.
He heals the brokenhearted and binds their wounds.
He commands angels to guard me in all ways.
The Lord’s name is a strong tower; I am safe.
He instructs and teaches me the way to go.
The Lord guides me and strengthens me continually.
Abide in Christ; ask, and it will be done.
Believe when you pray; you will receive.
Ask, seek, knock—God answers.
God does immeasurably more than I ask or think.
He fills me with joy and peace as I trust.
The peace of Christ rules in my heart.
May He grant my heart’s desires and plans succeed.
He orders the steps of the righteous.
No good thing does He withhold from the upright.
Because I love Him, He rescues and answers me.
He restores the years the locusts have eaten.
Instead of shame, I receive a double portion.
The Lord rejoices over me with singing.
Whom the Son sets free is free indeed.
Sin shall not have dominion over me.
The Spirit produces fruit in me.
Do not grow weary; a harvest is coming.
Approach the throne boldly to find grace and help.
Hold fast to hope; He who promised is faithful.
Faith is confidence in what we hope for.
God provides a way out of temptation.
Thanks be to God—He gives victory through Christ.
In Christ, I am a new creation.
God makes all grace abound for every good work.
He has delivered me from darkness to His kingdom.
I am complete in Christ.
Blessed with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
I am God’s workmanship, created for good works.
I am armed with the whole armor of God.
He who calls me is faithful; He will do it.
God sanctifies me wholly—spirit, soul, and body.
The Lord is faithful; He strengthens and guards me.
Saved by His mercy, not by my works.
Draw near to God, and He will draw near.
He gives living hope through Jesus’ resurrection.
After suffering a little, He restores and strengthens.
Greater is He in me than he in the world.
If we ask according to His will, He hears us.
He will wipe every tear; no more pain.
Jesus stands at the door and knocks.
I am like a tree planted, prospering in season.
In His presence is fullness of joy.
God arms me with strength and keeps my way secure.
Goodness and mercy follow me all my days.
He delivered me from all my fears.
I have not seen the righteous forsaken.
He heard my cry and set my feet on a rock.
I dwell in the secret place of the Most High.
His word is a lamp to my feet.
Commit your work to the Lord; plans succeed.
Humility and fear of the Lord bring riches and honor.
He keeps in perfect peace the mind stayed on Him.
Righteousness brings peace and confident rest.
No weapon formed against me shall prosper.
His word will not return void.
The latter glory will be greater than the former.
Those who hunger for righteousness will be filled.
Your Father rewards what is done in secret.
The Father gives good gifts to those who ask.
Where two or three gather, He is there.
With God, all things are possible.
Jesus is with us always, to the end.
All things are possible to the one who believes.
Nothing is impossible with God.
Give, and it will be given to you.
Fear not; it is the Father’s pleasure to give the kingdom.
Jesus is the bread of life; I won’t hunger.
Rivers of living water flow from within believers.
Jesus is the light of the world; I have light.
Jesus is the resurrection and the life.
In Him I have peace; He has overcome the world.
I receive power when the Holy Spirit comes.
Everyone who calls on the Lord will be saved.
Believe in the Lord Jesus and you will be saved.
God’s love is poured into my heart by the Spirit.
No condemnation for those in Christ Jesus.
The Spirit gives life to my mortal body.
Be transformed by renewing the mind.
